import React,{useEffect,useState,useRef}from'react';import*as d3 from'd3';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function StdDevChart(){const[data,setData]=useState([]);useEffect(function fetchData(){async function fetchData(){try{const response=await fetch('http://127.0.0.1:5000/hsr_character_stats/1005');const data=await response.json();setData(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data:',error);}}fetchData();},[]);const svgRef=useRef();useEffect(function drawChart(){const svg=d3.select(svgRef.current);const margin={top:20,right:20,bottom:30,left:40};const width=+svg.attr('width')-margin.left-margin.right;const height=+svg.attr('height')-margin.top-margin.bottom;const g=svg.append('g').attr('transform','translate('+margin.left+','+margin.top+')');// Define the bell curve function
const bellCurve=d3.line().x(function(d){return x(d[0]);}).y(function(d){return y(d[1]);});const x=d3.scaleLinear().range([0,width]);const y=d3.scaleLinear().range([height,0]);// Scale the data to fit the chart
x.domain(d3.extent(data,function(d){return d.x;}));y.domain([0,d3.max(data,function(d){return d.y;})]);// Draw the bell curve
g.append('path').datum(data).attr('fill','none').attr('stroke','steelblue').attr('stroke-width',1.5).attr('d',bellCurve);// Add X Axis
g.append('g').attr('transform','translate(0,'+height+')').call(d3.axisBottom(x));// Add Y Axis
g.append('g').call(d3.axisLeft(y));},[data]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("svg",{ref:svgRef,width:600,height:400});}export default StdDevChart;
